turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need a pizza from Rico's Pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, what kind of pizza are you wanting to order today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to have a large garlic bread crust pizza with extra pepperoni and extra sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It appears that the garlic crust pizza is no longer available. Would you like another crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure, can you tell me what crusts are available?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The crusts are panned, plain, tossed, and the special crust this month is cheesy bread crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, I think I would like the cheesy bread crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you still want the same toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yea, I want extra pepperoni and extra sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: On this type of crust, extra sauce is not available to be put on the pizza. Rico's can give you a side container of sauce. Would that be ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yea, that is perfectly fine. I can put it on the pizza when I get home.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else to go with this order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all there is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Allow me to confirm the order before placing.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Go ahead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are wanting a large cheesy bread crust pizza with extra pepperonis and a side container of sauce to be picked up at Rico's today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's all correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The order has officially been place and will be available for pick up in 25 minutes. Do you need more time on the pick up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I can be there in 25 minutes, that's great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order was placed. You will recieve a receipt via text in a moment. Thank you.
